dcterms:creator: M. H. M. Winands
Y. Björnsson
J.-T. Saito
dcterms:description: Lines of Action is a two-player game played on an 8x8 board where players aim to connect all their pieces in one unit. The game involves strategic movement based on the number of pieces in a line.
dcterms:title: Lines of Action

dcterms:creator: M. J. Herskovits
dcterms:description: Awari is a Mancala game played on a 2x6 board where players aim to capture counters by sowing them into specific holes. The game ends when no holes contain more than one counter.
dcterms:title: Awari

dcterms:creator: A. Kishimoto
M. H. M. Winands
M. Müller
J.-T. Saito
dcterms:description: MiniShogi is a variant of Shogi played on a 5x5 board with fewer pieces. The objective is to capture the opponent's King, with unique movement rules for each piece.
dcterms:title: MiniShogi

dcterms:creator: K. Handscomb
dcterms:description: Knightthrough is a variant of the game Breakthrough, played on an 8x8 board where each player moves pieces like knights in chess, aiming to reach the opponent's edge of the board.
dcterms:title: Knightthrough
